comment: The class itself is easy enough (attendance/ textbook/listening quizzes, concert reviews, and a final group presentation on anything music-related), but this professor was completely disorganized and incredibly rude. The lectures were also pretty boring.

Class wasnt too fun to go through because its about music throughout decades, interesting if you take a liking to it or dont really know about it. She started making attendance quizzes for the end of class. Some lectures were better than others. The group project is super easy, just make sure you pick the right people. textbook for quizzes

Pretty easy class lots of getting to know you opportunities in class for final group project. Amazing class if interested in music. This was a first semester at Kennesaw and so far not so bad! You get weekly quizzes and listening and lecture quizzes very easy as a whole though!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Easily the most unprofessional and disorganized professor I have ever encountered.

Professor Wehr is absolutely amazing. She's very caring and understanding, and responds to emails very fast. She listens to student feedback and makes the class very entertaining. The weekly quizzes are easy if you read the textbook, and attendance is mandatory.

Quiz every week but literally so easy. Group project at the end. Attendance is part of your grade but if you dont go you still pass all quizzes and assignments. Can be super unorganized. Shes super passionate about music and is chill on due dates.
